# Roadmap

## Phase 0 — Public baseline (current)
- Documentation + policies
- CI sanity checks
- Repo structure

## Phase 1 — Observability
- JSON event logging (decision traces)
- Run IDs + session summaries
- Incident logs (kill switch events)

## Phase 2 — Paper execution
- Paper trading harness
- Replay/backtest runner
- Metrics: win rate, drawdown, exposure

## Phase 3 — Controlled live
- Small sizing
- Hard risk limits enforced
- Read-only transparency summaries

No real-time signals will be posted.
